column3: See also the corresponding pull-req to BIP62: https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/132\n

I'm not 100% clear on why this code was duplicated; the next lines are identical but with "OP_0 << OP_1" rather than "OP_0 << OP_0". I believe this was just exercising different ways of failing the DER encoding, so I removed the way that is now valid.\n
